item.title: [PI] Adding willdy wyrm [PI]

item.description:
@aivaroza4 wrote:

Hi,so i want to add wildy wyrm to server,i use I Van I toturial,how to preload models to client,everythis was good,but when i try to add the wildy wyrm to the server i get this error:

Ints:

} if(i == 4000) { entityDef.actions = new String[5]; entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; entityDef.anIntArray94[0] = 63604; entityDef.standAnim = 12790; entityDef.walkAnim = 12790; entityDef.anInt86 = 150; entityDef.anInt91 = 150; entityDef.aByte68 = 5; entityDef.name = "WildyWyrm"; entityDef.combatLevel = 382; entityDef.description = "It's made of pure fire.".getBytes(); }

So what could be wrong? Thanks
